snippet: The debate is now over, and with it, our live fact-checking. The two candidates will face off again on each of the next two Tuesday nights, at 7 p.m. Oct. 22 on WCBS, and at 7 p.m. Oct. 29 on WNBC, and the election is Nov. 5.
abstract: The debate is now over, and with it, our live fact-checking. The two candidates will face off again on each of the next two Tuesday nights, at 7 p.m. Oct. 22 on WCBS, and at 7 p.m. Oct. 29 on WNBC, and the election is Nov. 5.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
